title: How do i get my phone repaired under warranty in Australia under COVID. 1800 numbers dont work.
content:
The back of my Pixel 4xl (purchased Oct 2019) gets very warm at times and the top back left portion of the glass back has popped from the phone.

How do i submit a phone for repair under warranty as the google store help pages state that the claim must be submitted via a 1800 phone number but all numbers have an automated message and no one is taking calls.

I am based in Australia.
